s0101: Moreover, has Your Majesty risen early and retired late not for Wu's sake?
s0102: We plotted for twenty-two years, and now abandon it in a day - can this be done?
s0103: Moreover, Heaven gives and one does not take - instead one receives the blame.
s0104: 'Those who cut firewood follow the pattern that is not far' - have you forgotten the shame of Kuaiji?'
s0105: Goujian said: 'I want to listen to your words, but I cannot bear to see the envoy harmed.'
s0237: Sima Qian said: Yu's merit was great indeed. He regulated the nine rivers, established the nine provinces, and to this day the various Xia live in peace.
s0238: His descendant Goujian tormented his body and concentrated his thoughts, finally extinguishing the strong state of Wu, observing his troops northward among the central states, honoring the Zhou house, and being called the Hegemon King.
s0239: Can Goujian not be called worthy!
s0240: He truly had Yu's remaining virtue.
s0241: Fan Li moved three times and each time had glorious fame, his name enduring for later generations.
s0242: With such ministers and lords, how could they fail to achieve fame!
